title: 工业2，怎么给喷气背包加燃料？
author: litim1

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
http://wiki.industrial-craft.net/index.php?title=Jetpack

Refuelling

A fully fuelled Jetpack can work for about 90 seconds. When the fuel gauge reaches about 5%, the Jetpack starts losing its power quickly. It can be completely refilled either by 18 Biofuel Cells, or by 6 Coalfuel Cells in a Canning Machine.
